EmailTemplate.name: 17.NokCorp.Partner.All.D.E.E.19059.Partners' PAC survey e-mail sendout.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: 2017 Partner Advisory Council, Rome, Italy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> PAC 2017 Thank you again for taking the time to participate at the Partner Advisory Council.
As mentioned in Rome, we are conducting a small post-event survey that will help us improve these councils in the future. Please help us by filling out the last part of the survey at the below link. These four questions should only take a minute to answer. We’ve also collected some sweet memories from the networking activity we participated in at the InRome Cooking School, including recipes and pictures. These are available for download <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201732]]>. The password to access the file is: PAC2017.
Thank you again and we look forward to continuing our dialog soon.
Sincerely,
Andrea Újlaki Regional Partner Marketing Manager, EMEA Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
